Share images by: About about.md Instalar OpenCV Manager Do you want to download OpenCV Manager from GitHub? Cancel Downloading Descargando OpenCV Manager Searching for a document \ nClick to scan the complete image Color mode B Automatic mode Manual mode Share this App Share the link by means of "Take a look at this app that scans documents from the camera for Operators:" Great app to scan travel documents for Operators Adjustments Basic settings Automatic labeling Define the automatic labels to be applied in scans marked using the special template Adjust to the preview aspect ratio Most devices have different aspect ratio with respect to the preview, this setting will select the highest image resolution that matches the aspect ratio of the pre-display Rotate the image 180º This setting configures everything in the best way Usage statistics Send several usage statistics to the developer. Content data will not be sent Send Message Send message to the developer Usage statistics Do you want to allow this App to send anonymous usage statistics to the developer? \ N \ nYou can change this at any time in the settings screen. After To work, this app requires that OpenCV Manager services, which have not yet been installed. Google Play Direct download Go to Settings Google Play is not available and installation from unknown sources is not enabled, please go to the settings and activate it.
